message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8500. Can you meet me halfway?
I understand you're looking to save a bit, but I have to make a profit. I can do $9500, but that's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you try to meet me at $8000?
